dashboard.label: Events of Interest
dashboard.definition: {"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=main sourcetype=\"OktaIM2:log\" | table _time,actor.alternateId,displayMessage,eventType,event_type_tags,admin_interest,security_interest,event_type_description | makemv delim=\"|\" event_type_tags | search (security_interest=1 OR admin_interest=1)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}}},"visualizations":{"viz_table_1":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":25,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"none","percentagesRow":false,"rowNumbers":false,"totalsRow":false,"wrap":true,"headerVisibility":"fixed","tableFormat":{"rowBackgroundColors":"> table | seriesByIndex(0) | pick(tableAltRowBackgroundColorsByTheme)"},"columnFormat":{"admin_interest":{"data":"> table | seriesByName(\"admin_interest\") | formatByType(admin_interestColumnFormatEditorConfig)","rowColors":"> table | seriesByName('admin_interest') | pick(admin_interestRowColorsEditorConfig)","rowBackgroundColors":"> table | seriesByName(\"admin_interest\") | rangeValue(admin_interestRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig)"}}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"context":{"admin_interestColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"number":{"thousandSeparated":false,"unitPosition":"after"}},"admin_interestRowColorsEditorConfig":["#000000"],"admin_interestRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig":[{"value":"#222233","to":1},{"value":"#cba700","from":1,"to":40},{"value":"#A81A45","from":40,"to":60},{"value":"#D97A0D","from":60,"to":80},{"value":"#CBA700","from":80}]}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"}},"layout":{"type":"grid","options":{},"structure":[{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1200,"h":250}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp"]},"title":"Events of Interest","defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}}}
